DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myMenuText: Drop Naval Depth Charge At Location
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Move the entity to the given location, then drop (create) a depth charge of the given type. The charge will descend to the given depth and explode.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>naval_depth_charge</myVariableName> <myType>navalmineresource</myType> <myLabel>Naval Depth Charge:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The type of depth charge to create.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>entitytypes=2:7:225:1:14:-1:-1</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>explode_at_depth</myVariableName> <myType>depth</myType> <myLabel>Explode at Depth</myLabel> <myToolTip>The depth the charge will sink to and explode.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1000</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>drop_location</myVariableName> <myType>location</myType> <myLabel>Drop Location:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The location the entity will move to before dropping the charge.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="8"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>use_current_altitude</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Use Current Altitude</myLabel> <myToolTip>Regardless of what the drop location altitude is set to be, use the altitude of the entity at the time the task is executed</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
